name: E-Transcript Bundle File
summary: Learn about .PTZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: NOTE: RealLegal, the developers of the PTZ format, were acquired by Thomson West. Both the West and RealLegal brands are used to advertise and sell similar software programs. RealLegal released an older version of RealLegal E-Transcript Viewer for Mac, but the software is only compatible with Mac OS Classic, the predecessor to Mac OS X.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
